titleStmt.title: A prognosticacion made for the yere of oure Lord Gods thousande fyue hundreth xlviii calculed for the meridian of Yorke and practysed by Anthony Askham ...
titleStmt.author: Askham, Anthony, fl. 1553.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Haigh Hall (reel 151) and the Bodleian Library (reel 1699).
